subject: Boxing
Olympic Games (2016)
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Since the International Boxing Association decided that male boxers would no longer wear protective headgear, facial cuts have become a growing problem for Olympic-style boxers fighting for places in Rio de Janeiro.
snippet: Since the International Boxing Association decided that male boxers would no longer wear protective headgear, facial cuts have become a growing problem for Olympic-style boxers fighting for places in Rio de Janeiro.
